name: emotive
description: Dynamic "css in js" without interpolation or language injection
author: zanomate

scripts.clean: shx rm -rf dist && shx mkdir dist
scripts.build: npm run es6 && npm run esm && npm run cjs && npm run umd
scripts.es6: npm run build:es6 && npm run uglify:es6
scripts.esm: npm run build:esm && npm run uglify:esm
scripts.cjs: npm run build:cjs && npm run uglify:cjs
scripts.umd: npm run build:umd && npm run uglify:umd
scripts.build:es6: tsc --moduleResolution node --module es2015 --target es2015 --outDir dist/es6 build/emotive.ts
scripts.build:esm: tsc --moduleResolution node --module es2015 --target es5 --outDir dist/esm build/emotive.ts
scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --outDir dist/cjs --declaration --declarationDir dist build/emotive.ts
scripts.build:umd: rollup dist/esm/emotive.js --format umd --name emotive --sourcemap --sourcemapFile dist/umd/emotive.map.js --file dist/umd/emotive.js
scripts.cp: shx cp build/package.json dist/package.json && shx cp README.md dist/README.md
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run gen && npm run build && npm run cp
